titles: Divine consolations, or, The teachings of God in three parts ... with an answer to the objections made against it, and Doctor Crips [sic] booke justified against Steven Geree / by Samuel Richardson.
author: Richardson, Samuel, fl. 1643-1658.
notes: Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Geree, Stephen, 1594-1656? --  Doctrine of the antinomians.
